column1: 0312|twelve minutes past three|A table with anglers' magazines and an ashtray
column2: a few books on a shelf
column5: a mantel clocked stopped at twelve minutes past three.

column2:
and Charlie was calling.
She answered
column3:
"Are you still sitting outside that hotel?"
"Yeah. This is bullshit. I'm going in to get this guy
column4: and I don't care what he's in the middle of doing."
